entry.title: Makers of Alien, Gladiator and Blade Runner to Produce The Infinite Machine Movie
entry.summary: Scott Free Productions will produce a feature film based on The Infinite Machine, Camila Russo's bestselling book on the history of Ethereum.Scott Free Productions will produce a feature film based on The Infinite Machine, Camila Russo's bestselling book on the history of Ethereum.
